meanings.definition: A type of medication used in chemotherapy to treat certain types of cancer.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed fluorouracils to help fight the cancer cells.
meanings.sent2: Patients undergoing chemotherapy often receive fluorouracils to combat the disease.
meanings.sent3: When the fluorouracils entered the body, the cancer cells started to retreat.
meanings.sent4: The fluorouracils acted like tiny soldiers attacking the cancer within.
meanings.sent5: The fluorouracils worked tirelessly to destroy the cancer, like brave warriors in battle.

meanings.definition: The plural form of the word 'fluorouracil'.
meanings.sent1: In the lab, they studied different samples of fluorouracils to compare their effects.
meanings.sent2: The researchers analyzed various fluorouracils to understand their properties.
meanings.sent3: The bag contained multiple fluorouracils, each labeled with a different code.
meanings.sent4: The box was filled with colorful fluorouracils, resembling a box of candies.
meanings.sent5: The shelves were stocked with jars of fluorouracils, like a rainbow of medicinal potions.
